references.paper_title: Qwen-vl: A versatile vision-language model for understanding, localization, text reading, and beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces a large vision-language model (LVLMs) that is foundational to the current work's methodology
This paper's transformer-based object detection method is relevant to the architecture of the models used in this study.
This paper's efficient object detection algorithm is compared to the current work's method.
This paper's denoising diffusion model is relevant to the inference time scaling analysis in this work.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper's approach to learning visual models from natural language is foundational to the understanding of LVLMs
